mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_name , register_date , product_price, category_name,product_content,delete_yn) VALUES (#{productName}, now(), #{productPrice} ,#{categoryName} ,#{productContent},#{deleteYn})
mapper.select: select product_seq, product_name, register_date, product_price, category_name, product_content from product where product_seq = #{ productSeq } and delete_yn = 1
mapper.update: update product set product_name = #{productName}, register_date = #{registerDate}, product_price = #{productPrice}, category_name = #{categoryName}, product_content = #{productContent}, delete_yn = #{deleteYn} where product_seq = #{ productSeq }
mapper.select: select p.product_seq, p.product_name, p.register_date, p.product_price, p.category_name, p.product_content, i.img_store, i.store_name from product p left join img_tb i on p.product_seq = i.product_seq where p.product_seq = #{productNo}
